response.overview: Lithe young women twist themselves into compromising positions in the latest anthology from Deeper.com. In Private Showing, an erotic art exhibit proves to be the perfect venue for Jade Maris to cheat on her partner with a stranger. Cecilia Taylor finds there are other ways to a man's heart than through his stomach in Pedicure. Molly Little likes to live dangerously, and she'll throw herself at a lucky guy so long as there might be a chance of them Getting Caught. In Hold It, submissive Chanel Camryn causes a scene in a diner when she crawls under the table for her dom. Each woman is flexible about what you can and can't get away with in public and puts on a performance for those who like it, Lithe.
response.title: Lithe
